001package reciprocal.number.fraction;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import com.google.common.math.LongMath;
007import java.io.Serial;
008import java.io.Serializable;
009import java.math.BigDecimal;
010import java.math.BigInteger;
011import java.math.MathContext;
012import java.util.Comparator;
013import java.util.function.BiFunction;
014import java.util.stream.Stream;
015import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
016
017/**
018 * Immutable implementation of a fraction that uses {@link Long} as type for
019 * its numerator and denominator
020 * <p>
021 * The returned Fractions of most methods are neither normalized nor reduced.
022 *
023 * @since 0.0.1
024 */
025public final class Fraction extends AbstractFraction<@NotNull Long, @NotNull Fraction, @NotNull Double> {
026    /**
027     * 0
028     *
029     * @since 0.0.1
030     */
031    public static final @NotNull Fraction ZERO = ofNumerator(0L);
032
033    /**
034     * 1
035     *
036     * @since 0.0.1
037     */
038    public static final @NotNull Fraction ONE = ofNumerator(1L);
039
040    /**
041     * Units
042     *
043     * @since 0.0.1
044     */
045    public static final Stream<Fraction> UNITS = Stream.iterate(ONE, f -> ofDenominator(f.getDenominator() + 1L));
046
047    @Serial
048    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
049
050    /**
051     * Constructor
052     *
053     * @param numerator numerator
054     * @param denominator denominator
055     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code denominator == 0}
056     * @since 0.0.1
057     */
058    public Fraction(final long numerator, final long denominator) {
059        super(numerator, denominator);
060        checkArgument(denominator != 0L, "denominator != 0 expected but denominator = %s", denominator);
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * Static factory method
065     *
066     * @param numerator numerator
067     * @return numerator / 1
068     * @since 0.0.1
069     */
070    public static @NotNull Fraction ofNumerator(final long numerator) {
071        return new Fraction(numerator, 1L);
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Static factory method
076     *
077     * @param denominator denominator
078     * @return 1 / denominator
079     * @since 0.0.1
080     */
081    public static @NotNull Fraction ofDenominator(final long denominator) {
082        return new Fraction(1L, denominator);
083    }
084
085    @Override
086    public boolean isInvertible() {
087        return getNumerator() != 0L;
088    }
089
090    @Override
091    public boolean isUnit() {
092        return getNumerator() == 1L;
093    }
094
095    @Override
096    public boolean isDyadic() {
097        return LongMath.isPowerOfTwo(getDenominator());
098    }
099
100    @Override
101    public boolean isIrreducible() {
102        return LongMath.gcd(Math.abs(getNumerator()), Math.abs(getDenominator())) == 1L;
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public boolean isProper() {
107        return Math.abs(getNumerator()) < Math.abs(getDenominator());
108    }
109
110    @Override
111    public int getSignum() {
112        final var numeratorCompareToZero = getNumerator().compareTo(0L);
113        if (numeratorCompareToZero == 0) {
114            return 0;
115        }
116        return numeratorCompareToZero == getDenominator().compareTo(0L) ? 1 : -1;
117    }
118
119    @Override
120    public @NotNull Fraction add(final @NotNull Fraction summand) {
121        requireNonNull(summand, "summand");
122        final var num = summand.getDenominator() * getNumerator() + getDenominator() * summand.getNumerator();
123        final var den = getDenominator() * summand.getDenominator();
124        return new Fraction(num, den);
125    }
126
127    @Override
128    public @NotNull Fraction subtract(final @NotNull Fraction subtrahend) {
129        requireNonNull(subtrahend, "subtrahend");
130        final var num = subtrahend.getDenominator() * getNumerator() - getDenominator() * subtrahend.getNumerator();
131        final var den = getDenominator() * subtrahend.getDenominator();
132        return new Fraction(num, den);
133    }
134
135    @Override
136    public @NotNull Fraction multiply(final @NotNull Fraction factor) {
137        requireNonNull(factor, "factor");
138        return new Fraction(getNumerator() * factor.getNumerator(), getDenominator() * factor.getDenominator());
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    public @NotNull Fraction negate() {
143        return new Fraction(-getNumerator(), getDenominator());
144    }
145
146    @Override
147    public @NotNull Fraction abs() {
148        return new Fraction(Math.abs(getNumerator()), Math.abs(getDenominator()));
149    }
150
151    @Override
152    public @NotNull Fraction expand(final @NotNull Long number) {
153        requireNonNull(number, "number");
154        return new Fraction(number * getNumerator(), number * getDenominator());
155    }
156
157    @Override
158    public boolean lessThanOrEqualTo(final @NotNull Fraction other) {
159        requireNonNull(other, "other");
160        final var normalized = normalize();
161        final var normalizedOther = other.normalize();
162        final var left = normalizedOther.getDenominator() * normalized.getNumerator();
163        final var right = normalized.getDenominator() * normalizedOther.getNumerator();
164        return left <= right;
165    }
166
167    @Override
168    public @NotNull Fraction normalize() {
169        if (getSignum() < 0 && getNumerator().compareTo(0L) > 0) {
170            return new Fraction(-getNumerator(), Math.abs(getDenominator()));
171        }
172        if (getSignum() < 0) {
173            return this;
174        }
175        if (getSignum() == 0) {
176            return ZERO;
177        }
178        return abs();
179    }
180
181    @Override
182    public @NotNull Fraction reduce() {
183        final var gcd = LongMath.gcd(Math.abs(getNumerator()), Math.abs(getDenominator()));
184        return new Fraction(getNumerator() / gcd, getDenominator() / gcd);
185    }
186
187    @Override
188    public @NotNull BigDecimal toBigDecimal() {
189        return BigDecimal.valueOf(getNumerator()).divide(BigDecimal.valueOf(getDenominator()), MathContext.DECIMAL128);
190    }
191
192    /**
193     * Returns this as {@link BigFraction}
194     *
195     * @return {@link BigFraction}
196     */
197    public @NotNull BigFraction toBigFraction() {
198        return new BigFraction(BigInteger.valueOf(getNumerator()), BigInteger.valueOf(getDenominator()));
199    }
200
201    @Override
202    protected @NotNull Fraction getOne() {
203        return ONE;
204    }
205
206    @Override
207    protected @NotNull BiFunction<@NotNull Long, @NotNull Long, @NotNull Fraction> getConstructor() {
208        return Fraction::new;
209    }
210
211    @Override
212    public int compareTo(final @NotNull Fraction o) {
213        return FractionComparator.INSTANCE.compare(this, o);
214    }
215
216    /**
217     * Comparator
218     *
219     * @since 0.0.1
220     */
221    public static final class FractionComparator implements Comparator<Fraction>, Serializable {
222        /**
223         * Instance
224         *
225         * @since 0.0.1
226         */
227        public static final FractionComparator INSTANCE = new FractionComparator();
228
229        @Serial
230        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
231
232        private FractionComparator() {
233        }
234
235        @Override
236        public int compare(final @NotNull Fraction o1, final @NotNull Fraction o2) {
237            requireNonNull(o1, "o1");
238            requireNonNull(o2, "o2");
239            if (o1.lessThan(o2)) {
240                return -1;
241            }
242            if (o1.greaterThan(o2)) {
243                return 1;
244            }
245            return 0;
246        }
247    }
248}
